ClassDesc: A @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject2_E@ represents a UI element. Unlike @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject_E@, it is bound to a particular view instance and can become stale if the underlying view object is destroyed. As a result, it may be necessary to call @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiDevice#findObject_E@ to obtain a new @B_android#support#test#uiautomator#UiObject2_E@ instance if the UI changes significantly.
